original_text: People were bringing little children to Jesus for him to place his hands on them, but the disciples rebuked them.
korean_text: 사람들이 예수께서 만져 주심을 바라고 어린 아이들을 데리고 오매 제자들이 꾸짖거늘

sentences.original_text: People were bringing little children to Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 예수님께 어린 아이들을 데리고 오고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: for him to place his hands on them
